achievements.name: First Command
achievements.description: Run your first command in Qwen Code.

achievements.name: Code Explorer
achievements.description: Use Qwen Code to explore a codebase.

achievements.name: Refactor Master
achievements.description: Refactor a function using Qwen Code.

achievements.name: Bug Squasher
achievements.description: Submit a bug report using the `/bug` command.

achievements.name: Community Helper
achievements.description: Reply to a thread in the community hub.

achievements.name: Plugin Enthusiast
achievements.description: Install a plugin from the marketplace.

achievements.name: Knowledge Seeker
achievements.description: Use the `/learn` command to open the learning platform.

achievements.name: Data Driven
achievements.description: Use the `/dashboard` command to open the analytics dashboard.
